pullrequest.title: Added a collision bitmask field to sdf-1.5 and c++11 support

content.raw:
CI status:

* [homebrew ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/46/)
* [trusty ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64-docker/51/)
* [utopic ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-utopic-amd64/4/)
* [windows ok](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-windows7-amd64/32/)
* [drone (precise) broken](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/441)
* [jenkins precise broken](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/SDFormat/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64/51/) (it says it's a trusty build, but there's something in the script that makes it run on precise)

I would c++11 to break the build on precise, so no surprises here.
content.html:
CI status:

  • homebrew ok
  • trusty ok
  • utopic ok
  • windows ok
  • drone (precise) broken
  • jenkins precise broken (it says it's a trusty build, but there's something in the script that makes it run on precise)

I would c++11 to break the build on precise, so no surprises here.
